posts.post_content:
Have a group of graded cards available for trade or sale. Will listen to offers but anyone saying "I'll take it" gets priority. Will listen to offers, especially if buying more than 1. Shipping is included.

Paypal Friends or money order please.

$CLOSED Atz SGC 40
$SOLD George Hunter PSA 4.5
$SOLD George Hunter SGC 50
$SOLD Tannehill No L Beckett raw review 5.0. Excellent corners
$SOLD Lavender PSA 5  
$SOLD Orth Old Mill PSA 2 
$SOLD Orth Piedmont SCD 3 
$SOLD Lobert PSA 3
$SOLD Lennox SGC 40
$SOLD F. Smith SGC 40
